phrases: It is something very precious to me.
Sorry, what did you just say?
I could not really hear you.
Senpai, what were you planning on telling her just now?
I was going to tell her that I like her.
Were not you saying you were not sure if your feelings were romantic or not
Yup, so I figured it out just a second ago.
Thanks to my brother, I finally realized how I felt.
I am in love with Serinuma-san.
So I have to tell her how I feel
as soon as I possibly can.
No one gets a head start!
He means we all feel the same as you.
I like her too, and so does everyone here.
Then you should all tell her how you feel, too.
You do not need to tell us!
As far as I know, I do not think any of us have actually told her how we feel.
That is not right at all!
Well, you are all free to do as you like,
but I am going to tell her how I feel.
W-We were so preoccupied by Mutsumi's older brother that we...
We pushed the person into action that should never be pushed into action.
We have to stop him somehow!
I have a favor to ask.
There is an event at the end of the month and my draft is a bit behind schedule.
Can you please come over and be my assistant for a while, starting today?
Okay, I will help in whatever way I can!
Then I would better tell Mutsumi-senpai I am not coming to club
I have to talk to him anyway, so I will tell him while I am at it!
I was not called carrier pigeon in elementary school for nothing.
I will be sure to let him know!
Do not call me weird names!
As if I would leave the two of you alone.
Just when I thought I had my chance.
Igarashi-senpai, can you please scan and clean this?
Sorry, I am going to borrow the restroom.
I have just arranged things with Serinuma's older brother.
He said he will stop Senpai from making any contact with her.
I am surprised you were able to persuade him.
I told him Mutsumi-senpai was going a bit wild
and Serinuma might be in danger.
You never know what a guy like him could do!
I have blocked Mutsumi-senpai's number on her phone!
All right, let us get cracking!
We will not let Mutsumi-senpai tell her anything!
No matter how dirty we have to play!
We are Always Looking For New Members!
The number you are trying to reach is currently unavailable.
Ono no Imoko was a guy?!
I am interested in Japanese history!
Soga no Umako was a guy, too?!
The number you are trying to reach is currently unavailable.
I have been having her over every day for the past few days.
For now, she does not appear to suspect anything.
Yesterday, I got word from Takuro-san.
And all it said was, I like you.
W-Well, we have gotten this far!
Hopefully he will eventually give up.
Where the heck is he going?
I will not let you make it to Serinuma-senpai!
He actually escaped out the window?!
And this is the second floor!
I am sorry, he got me!
I need to talk to you.
Please meet me on the roof today after school.
He is just like his brother!
How could you be so bold?
We will not let you make a move!
why are you trying so hard to stop me?
I think you are all free to tell her how you feel.
So I will not stop you.
Those who want to tell her can come to the roof.
I will see you after school.
And so, in this case, you use the formula to...
It is not like she will just return my feelings if I get in someone else's way.
I have to tell her, or nothing will happen.
But, if I do tell her,
will she still smile the same way she does now?
If her heart does belong to one person,
what happens if I am not that person?
Still, the thing I am hoping for most
YOU-Um, what did you want to talk about?
Or more like, why is everyone here?
I wanted you to come so I could tell you how I feel about you,
but it looks like I am not alone.
Serinuma-san, I really do like you.
Will you go out with me?
Oh gosh, Mikkun, you are such a meanie!
Just kidding, I am totally fine with it!
Sorry, someone is at the door.
Oh, you do not need to hang up, just hold on.
I am sure this will just take a
They were all very earnest, and want me to go out with them.
We do not need an answer right away.
We just wanted you to know how we felt.
I am sure this came as a shock to you.
We just wanted to make sure you knew.
This is not a lie or a joke.
This is how we really feel.
If they do not need an answer, what is the rush?
No, they all looked very serious.
That is why I have got to take this seriously, too.
thinking about them, and then giving them an answer.
Or, that is what I thought.
So, what are you going to do?
Who are you going to choose?
What do you think of each of them, in summary?
He is got that soothing presence that makes him the perfect top!
He is such a klutz, and a definite bottom.
But depending on his development, I think he could switch to a top!
Oh, but, Akane-chan is definitely a bottom!
Why do you seem like you have not made any progress at all?!
B-But, honestly, I have never looked at them in any other way.
What can I do to get to know them all better?
Hmm, if it were an otome game, you could just follow their character routes.
And so, for each day of the holiday next week, I would like to
go on a date with each one of you!
And then, at the end of the holidays,
I would like to give my answers to the offers you each graciously made me the other day.
I thank you for your patience!
What is the meaning of this?
The offers we made the other day?
She means when we asked her out, right?
And if she gives us an answer after the dates, then...
The dates will decide who wins the fight.
Want To go to the aquarium?
Oh, that fish looks so funny!
Oh, you mean the Asian sheepshead wrasse?
They are females when they are young, but mature into males as they age.
I am surprised you know all that.
Actually, I just Googled it the other day.
All right then, how about that
Igarashi-kun is very engaging in conversation.
He is very considerate and kind.
He is really easy to get along with.
Let us ride the Ferris wheel.
And, at times, he says things that are really embarrassing.
Let us go to Usami Land!
Got To have all the fun you can when you come to a place like this!
First, we got to hit the Usami Coaster!
Nanashima-kun was a little constrained at first,
but he loosened up, and was his usual self.
He really knows how to have a good time.
And I had so much fun!
Where are your mommy and daddy?
Nanashima-kun, what kind of face is that?!
You are making my tummy hurt!
Oh, for some reason, I am feeling a bit...
I cannot believe you made her laugh when she was crying so much.
Well, you know I have a little sister.
And she is adored my arsenal of funny faces since she was tiny.
I wonder if this is what you call gap moe?
Do you know about the alpaca park?
I have got food for you.
Shinomiya-kun, it is eating your hair!
Shinomiya-kun is the kind of guy you cannot leave alone.
You are fine, you are fine!
Please do not laugh at me.
If I had a little brother, I think it would feel just like this.
This one charges any couple he sees.
But sometimes, you can rely on him just a little.
Shall we go somewhere good to eat?
I have reserved the whole place, so feel free to relax.
Every single thing she does is elegant.
Sometimes it feels like we live in two separate worlds.
When I see such beautiful scenery...
It makes me want to put out an Akane x Lord honeymoon book!
They would start at the venue stage,
and then, they would not be able to leave their room for a whole day!
Akane-chan would try to leave, and the lord would not let him!
The lord trying to use his last chance with him!
And Akane-chan would be all about fulfilling his lord's wishes!
And Akane would not be aware of the fact that this would be their last time alone!
She is so fun to be around!
Shall we take an old map and go exploring?
This is where the old Edo Five Routes start.
So it does not start at the Imperial Palace.
It has not changed at all from the Edo era!
I cannot believe there is such a forested area within the city!
Well, since we are here, shall we pay a visit?
Senpai, as always, talks in a gentle voice, very softly.
He is so kind and soothing.
Was he really serious about that?
Serinuma-san, what did you wish for?
I wished for the lord and Akane-chan to live happily ever after!
Also, for Shion to come back to life,
and for Captain Levi to show his soft side,
I wished that you and I could be together forever.
You know, I probably always liked you.
But, I did not know there could be a special kind of like.
Serinuma-san, you are the one who taught me this feeling.
Have you made up your mind?
Now I am even more confused.
They are all good people, and have their own charms.
They are all kind, and I think I like them all.
But, there is something just not there.
We reached out to the sky...
The one I have special feelings for is...
I have found the person that is special to me.
They are going to air another season of Mirage Saga!
There was a silhouette that had to be Shion!
He is coming back to life!
The staff knows what we all love!
I spent all night searching online, and
I was looking through the animators' tweets, but it looks like production is already going
and they have already started the storyboards.
I hope the staff is the same!
And of course, the second season will cover the foreshadowing with Panasharu,
and the dagger given to Terra.
There are too many key things!
Oh, but there are new characters, too!
What if a new pairing is born?
No, it is got to be Terra x Shion!
I have been waiting for so long!
The day they will be together is finally here!
Anime Ito has an early merch exhibit today and is taking reservations!
So, that is how it is!
Serinuma-san looks like she is having a lot of fun!
The prince should be with the princess.
Who was the one who decided that?
A prince should be with a prince.
This is the best place for the princess to be.
The princess had a life full of joy thereafter.
And they all lived happily ever after.
